amendment.description: An amendment numbered 241 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to provide additional funding for the Indian Community Development Block Grant Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck amendment (A085) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Heck amendment (A085) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A085) offered by Mr. Heck.
